htmlform.formDescription: Entry form for patients enrolled for ANC services

obs.answerLabels: C - Counseled but declined HIV testing, T - Counseled and tested but didn't receive results, TR - Counseled tested and results given - Client tested HIV Negative, TRR - Counseled tested and results given - Client tested HIV Positive, TR√ - ANC revisit clients with a known HIV Negative status, TRR√ - ANC revisit clients with a known HIV Positive status, TRK; - Clients with documented HIV Negative status, TRRK; - Clients with documented HIV Positive status, TR+ - Client tested HIV Negative on a re-test, TRR+ - Client tested HIV Positive on a re-test

C - Counseled but declined HIV testing, T - Counseled and tested but didn't receive results, TR - Counseled tested and results given - Client tested HIV Negative, TRR - Counseled tested and results given - Client tested HIV Positive, TR√ - ANC revisit clients with a known HIV Negative status, TRR√ - ANC revisit clients with a known HIV Positive status, TRK - Clients with documented HIV Negative status, TRRK - Clients with documented HIV Positive status, TR+ - Client tested HIV Negative on a re-test, TRR+ - Client tested HIV Positive on a re-test

obs.labelText: Results recorded on a previous visit?

obs.answerLabels: ART - Initiated ART for eMTCT on visit,ARTK - Client already on HAART before this pregnancy,ART√ - Client is revist and was prescribed on earlier visit,NA - Not Applicable

1 - No signs,2 - Presumptive TB , 3C - TB Diagnosed - Clinically diagnosed, 3G - TB Diagnosed - Gene Xpert, 3L - TB Diagnosed - TB LAM, 3M - TB Diagnosed -TB Microscopy, 3X - TB Diagnosed - Chest Xray, 3O - TB Diagnosed - Others, 4 - Currenty on TB Treatment, 5 - Completed TB Treatment
PHY - Physical Violence,SX: Sexual Violence, PSY - Psychological Violence, NIL - No History Signs and Symptoms of GBV
A Postive, A Negative, B Postive, B Negative, O Postive, O Negative, AB Postive, AB Negative
Normal,Sickle cell disease, Sickle cell Trait

div.div: Syphilis and Hep B Test Results

obs.answerLabels: Rx - Client tested positive results given and treatment initiated, +Ve - Client tested positive results given but treatment not yet initiated, NR - Client tested negative and results given, NT - Client not Tested for Syphilis/Hep B

Rx - Client tested positive results given and treatment initiated, +Ve - Client tested positive results given but treatment not yet initiated, NR - Client tested negative and results given, RX√ - Revisit - Client tested positive and results given, +Ve√ - Revisit - Client tested positive but not yet given treatment, NR√ - Revisit - Client tested negative results given, RX+ - Retest - Client tested positive and results given, +Ve+ - Retest -Client tested positive but not yet given treatment, NR+ - Retest - Client tested negative and results given, NT - Client not Tested for Syphilis/Hep B
C - Counselling Done, C/D - Counselling and Provided with Condoms
1 - IPT1, 2 - IPT2, 3 - IPT3, 4 - IPT4, 5 - IPT5, ND - Not Due,C - Complete,CTX - Septrin(CTX) given for the first time on that visit,CTX√ - Septrin prescribed on a previous visit and given a refill
√ - Dose Received, X - Dose Not Received, ND - Not due for dose,C - Completed Dose
REFOUT - Referred Out,REF IN - Referred In,C/REF IN - Referred in from community,FSG - Referred to family support groups
